rules_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.
Monument {3}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your end step, judge target creature you control. [i](Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.)[/i]
flavor_text2:
[i]“Slaughter of the Shah! Pale Piruz with blood claimed the demon's mantle while mortals found feathers in wise Jahan's law.”
[/i]—The Tale of Kings[i][/i]
